== Installation ==

Install in recovery (IN CORRECT ORDER!!!):

1. http://www.mediafire.com/?6haganq8amf8gf7

2. http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/ubuntu-touch/daily-preinstalled/current/saucy-preinstalled-touch-armhf.zip

3. http://www.mediafire.com/?klmjdtz9wnfv0h7

=== Unlocking instructions ===

1. Make sure you have V20B JellyBean update (through OTA or KDZ).

2. Turn on phone with SIM Card inserted and use it for about 1 hour. 

3. Make sure you have adb and phone drivers installed on computer.

4. Type in Terminal or CMD adb reboot oem-unlock.

5. When phone reboots to unlocking phone press vol+ button.

6. Your phone will go to fastboot mode with bootloader unlocked.

== Known issues ==

1. Brightness control problems (propably bad permissions).

2. Dead sleeps sometimes.

3. No camera preview.

4. No RIL, SMS, Wi-Fi.

5. Gallery not starting

== The image ==
=== How to build it (for now don't try, because repositories are under construction) ===
Clone the ubuntu sources by following the first steps of the porting guide.

1. First clone the repositories at https://github.com/artas182x/android_device_lge_p760.git with the cm-10.1 branch to device/lge/p760 and the kernel https://github.com/artas182x/lge-kernel-omap4.git android-omap-3.0 branch kernel/lge/omap4-common respectively. 

2. Please also remember to clone vendor and place it in vendor/lge/p760 https://github.com/artas182x/android_vendor_lge_p760.git

3. Then run . build/envsetup.sh

4. Then type brunch p760

Your new build will be in the out/target/ directory. 

=== Redistributability ===
Are all parts of the image freely redistributable?
Modified device tree: https://github.com/artas182x/android_device_lge_p760.git

Now using this kernel: https://github.com/artas182x/lge-kernel-omap4.git

Sources for Ubuntu are at: http://phablet.ubuntu.com/gitweb
